item.title: BTG
item.description: score:50 Chances: B2Gold Corp. will release its first quarter 2024 financial results after the North American markets close on Tuesday, May 7, 2024. Mali’s industrial gold output is expected to drop by about 14% this year to 53.7 metric tons, which may impact the company’s operations and earnings.
